title: Screen Design with Abstract Geometric Forms
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gouache, gold and silver paint, graphite on illustration board
description: Design for three-paneled screen with rectilinear and textured forms resting on a rectilinear base.   Some shapes imitate wood grain, some in rough gold paint.  Three of forms are ornamented with silver polka dots.  Upper left and lower right shapes have rounded corners.
name: Drawing
